locations.full_paragraph: 4. **Verification Required:** All findings, citations, and recommendations must be independently verified by qualified legal counsel before reliance. While the research platform employs verification protocols (98.6% of citations marked [VERIFIED]), AI-generated content may contain errors requiring human attorney review.
